description: The Yard Sale The finale begins with West being picked up at a yard sale by R.J. Parker and Rob Edwards. After some super-submissive sucking and cock worship, the trio get down in a flip-around fuck-a-thon! The climax comes when Edwards and Parker take turns pummeling West's marathon manhole first with one, then with two fists at a time!
title: Sit On It, Scene #03
